net.munki.javabot.config

Class JBConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.munki.javabot.config.JBConfig

  • public class JBConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads and writes properties data for JavaBot.

      • read

        public static java.util.Properties read(java.lang.String defaultFile,
                        java.lang.String configFile)
                                 throws JBConfigurationException
        Reads configuration settings into a Properties object.
        Parameters:
        defaultFile - The file containing default properties.
        configFile - The file containing non-default properties.
        Returns:
        A Properties object containing configuration data.
        Throws:
        JBConfigurationException - Thrown if there is a problem reading the properties.

      • write

        public static void write(java.util.Properties config,
         java.lang.String configFile)
                  throws JBConfigurationException
        Writes config data back to a file.
        Parameters:
        config - The properties object containing the configuration.
        configFile - The file to write to.
        Throws:
        JBConfigurationException - Thrown if there is a problem reading the properties.
